name: 32 in 1 Small Precision Screwdriver Set, Zoikuloi Magnetic Mini Screwdriver Set, Professional Tiny Repair Tool Kit for Glasses, Watches, Laptop, Electronics, Toys, Jewelry, Computers
short_description: Family must-have: Every family has watches, mobile phones, glasses, toys, computers, jewelry, electronic devices, etc. Similarly, every home and office has at least two screwdriver sets, which is part of your work and life. You can use them yourself or give them as presents to relatives, friends or colleagues

Green handle: Green grass, green forest, green always brings wonderful visual enjoyment. The green handle is light and non-slip, ergonomically designed, and can be used horizontally or vertically. The plastic head adopts forward and backward push motion and rotatable design

Screwdriver bits: 30 screwdriver bits are premium CR-V chrome vanadium steel, with phillips PH000 PH00 PH0 PH1 PH2, slotted -1.5 -2.0 -2.5 -3.0 -4.0, torx T4 T5 T6 T8 T9 T10, hexagon H1.5 H2.0 H2.5 H3.0 H3.5 H4.0, triangle 2.0 2.3, triwing Y2.0 Y3.0, pentagon 0.8 1.2 2.0, U-type 2.3, each screwdriver bit has magnetic adsorption, which can quickly replace the screws

Extension rod: The extension rod is divided into 3 equal sections. The extension rod can be directly inserted into the horizontal handle for use, or the handle can be pressed in the opposite direction and then inserted into the vertical handle for use. It can be long or short and is used for screws in narrow spaces. The head of the extension rod is equipped with a black metal head with magnetic adsorption, which can quickly replace the screwdriver bits

Convenient packaging: You can see 30 upright screwdriver bits through the lid of the transparent plastic storage box, allowing you to quickly find the screwdriver bits you want, open it with one button when you need it, and close it with one button when you are done, saving time and effort
